name: Librarium Dragonbones Demo 2.0
description:
Today we see the release for Librarium Dragonbones Demo 2.0!

A very significant update to the original Librarium Dragonbones Sample Project !

The Librarium Dragonbones Demo 2.0 provides a reference point and starter project for those looking to implement Librarium's Animated Battlers into their own projects but are unsure on how to set everything up!

It provides a base framework to visualize what you can expect with Librarium Animated battlers, and also tips on how to adjust their battle sequences and actions!

Non stock-RM assets and animated battlers are subject to standard Librarium terms of use, which can be found here:
http://www.akashics.moe/terms-of-use/

Featured Librarium Animated Creatures:

  • Dark Queen Shaccad Yoggoth
  • Sea Dragon Leviathan
  • Thunder Dragon Huanglong
  • Arcane Golem
  • Runic Golem

Librarium currently has over 80 dragonbones animated battlers and over 700 static battlers waiting for you!

More resources: http://www.akashics.moe/

Every plugin you might ever need: http://yanfly.moe/

Help support more creations like this! https://www.patreon.com/aekashics?ty=h

-Ækashics 

Special Thanks:
Yanfly!

Download more animated battlers today!
